name: Google Vertex AI
description: Import Google Vertex AI training jobs, batch prediction jobs, custom jobs, and ML pipelines for machine learning workflow orchestration.
author: Dagster Community

outputs.description: Generates assets for each Vertex AI entity

location.label: Location
location.description: GCP location/region for Vertex AI resources

credentials_path.description: Path to GCP service account credentials JSON file (optional)

import_training_jobs.label: Import Training Jobs
import_training_jobs.description: Import training job definitions as materializable assets

import_batch_prediction_jobs.description: Import batch prediction job definitions as materializable assets

import_custom_jobs.label: Import Custom Jobs
import_custom_jobs.description: Import custom job definitions as materializable assets

import_pipelines.label: Import Pipelines
import_pipelines.description: Import ML pipeline definitions as materializable assets

filter_by_labels.label: Filter by Labels
filter_by_labels.description: Comma-separated label keys to filter entities

group_name.description: Group name for all imported assets
